answerText: testosterone[10] The biosynthesis of testosterone begins when an oxidase cleaves the sidechain of this molecule to give pregnenolone. This molecule is also a precursor to all of the estradiols.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Penn A + Chicago B | 19 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For 10 points each, answer these questions about a gonadal hormone and its production. [10] This androgen is the primary sex hormone in male humans. It causes enlargement of the sebaceous glands and increases in body odor and hair.
